column1: Big Basin Redwoods State Park / Dogs are allowed only on paved roads within the developed campgrounds and picnic areas
column2: but not on park trails and dirt service roads. No dogs are allowed in Rancho Del Oso. 21600 Big Basin Way

column1: The Forest of Nisene Marks State Park/Leashed dogs are allowed only in the picnic areas and on Aptos Creek Road up to the Porter Picnic Area. Aptos Creek Road past Soquel Drive
